analysis.description:
Crowdsale.createTokenContract (/unique_contracts/0x32c98501992cd1b10f48a0f429bbf997e9f598cc.sol#55-62) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.mint(wallet,20000000000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0x32c98501992cd1b10f48a0f429bbf997e9f598cc.sol#57)
